page.title: 09Housing in all the areas
page.content: Housing in Barton is varied. There is a 1950's council estate, many Victorian homes and a late 1960's private housing estate. In Wychnor the houses are mostly Victorian farm buildings and cottages, or are buildings connected with Wychnor Hall in some way. In Alrewas there are many fine half- timbered, thatched houses dating from as early as the 15th century. These are on Main Street or close to it. Mixed in with these are some Victorian cottages, some 1930's detatched houses with big gardens and a 1970's private housing estate. There are some brand new executive detached bungalows fronting onto the canal. The vicarage is a 1960's modernistic house which does not blend well at all.
